artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape view of water with sandbars; figures on sandbar at right and on beach in foreground, left of center; three boats; mountain peak in background center; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: Censor seals: 米良 {Mera}, 渡辺 {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Tamagawa River in Musashi Province from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
